title: Jester

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Inspire. They heal 3 stress and their visit becomes astral tonight.
- At night, choose to play a Solo. You stay home. Each visitor gains 4 stress.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can't Inspire the same target two nights in a row. You also can't Inspire yourself.
- You can only play a Solo once.
- If you die the same night you play a Solo, your evil visitors gain 8 stress instead of 4.
